mapper.select: SELECT r.*, u_curr.nick_name AS userName, u_appr.nick_name AS approverName, c.name AS categoryName FROM itam_asset_requests r LEFT JOIN sys_user u_curr ON r.user_id = u_curr.id LEFT JOIN sys_user u_appr ON r.approver_id = u_appr.id LEFT JOIN itam_categories c ON r.category_id = c.id ${ew.customSqlSegment}
